title: Heated
description: Jerilyn desperately wants a better life for her family, but with her mother locked up and her unpredictable sister, she finds that she is always in an uphill battle. Finally, she gets a little break, but her baby daddy and his criminal ways are determined not to see her succeed. Cursed with early menopause, she finds herself in one hot mess. Jerilyn must rely on her wits and her faith, not only for the sake of her kids, but ultimately to save her life.
author: J.C.   Gardner
